name: swisher
description: Create shareable Swish payments, either QR-code or URL (with optional encryption key) to hide sensitive data with AES256 encryption. This allow users to share payment links without exposing phone number or payment details.
author: Carl Barrdahl <carlbarrdahl@gmail.com>

scripts.start: npm run watch:css & HTTPS=true react-scripts start
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:css && react-scripts build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
